article.title: Lockheed to Modernize Long-Range Radars
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, MS2 Radar Systems, Liverpool, New York, is being awarded about $30 million for modernization of 29 AN/FPS-117 long-range radars via the essential parts replacement program. The Ogden Air Logistics Center at Hill Air Force Base, Utah, is the contracting activity.
